__README__: This is a template. Copy this to workflow/user-config.json and fill in your values.
__INSTRUCTIONS__: During first use, Claude will ask for these values and create user-config.json automatically.

backlog.__HELP__: Find these in your Backlog project URL or by listing projects with MCP tools

execution.__HELP__: Runtime settings - usually don't need to change these
